title: GoodData to Present at DataWeek 2015 on Data Security
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/24/2015 @ 6:00 AM   GoodData 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/24/15 -- GoodData , the leading provider of business intelligence for data monetization to enterprises and ISVs, today announced its Chief Security Officer, Bil Harmer, will speak on the rise of the DevOpsSec security model at Integrate 2015 , as part of API World and DataWeek. 
Harmer will discuss how SaaS companies can design and hire security teams that create tight coupling between DevOps and Security to reduce operational risks and improve the trust in cloud delivery. He will detail how GoodData utilizes this model in building and managing its analytics delivery platform on behalf of thousands of organizations to improve business relationships, increase customer stickiness and even create new revenue streams from data products. 
"Cloud has created the opportunity for lightning-speed change," said Harmer. "However, as traditional production cycles are swapped out for bi-weekly, daily and even hourly updates, security must also evolve to ensure we reduce the prevalence of data breaches that continue to increase in size and frequency." 
Harmer joined GoodData from SuccessFactors, an SAP company, where he served as VP security and cloud privacy officer. He is CISSP, CISM and CIPP certified and at SuccessFactors, he built and ran their Security, Privacy and Compliance programs. Prior to SuccessFactors, Harmer managed security and infrastructure for the Ontario Government, Manulife Financial, Critical Path and DocSpace. 
DataWeek 2015 is one of the largest data innovation events in the Bay area for the third year running, where thousands of engineers and executives converge to discuss the role of data + API innovation on business, technology, and society. Join in the conversation by following Harmer's (@WilHarm3) and the event's (@dataweeksf) Twitter handles with the hashtag, #integrate15. 
The Rise of DevOpsSec Session Details When: Tuesday, September 29 at 4:15-4:35pm PT Where: DataWeek Main Stage at the Santa Clara Convention Center To Register: http://dataweek.co/register/ 
About GoodData GoodData ® provides groundbreaking BI for data monetization to enterprises, independent software vendors, and system integrators who seek to quickly create and distribute valuable information to large networks of customers and partners. Our real-time analytics distribution platform is highly scalable and secure -- allowing companies like Target, Discovery International and Zendesk to deploy engaging data products that are guided by GoodData's expertise in delivering widely-adopted analytics solutions. 
GoodData is headquartered in San Francisco and is backed by Andreessen Horowitz, General Catalyst Partners, Intel Capital, TOTVS and others. For more information, read our blog , visit our website and follow GoodData on Twitter and LinkedIn .
